comment: Like to see weather on task bar

title: almost there
comment: needs a - symbol of temperature is in the negatives, like below zero.

title: Great size - easy to read, but . . .
comment: This would be a 5 star rating if the temperature included the degree symbol.  Even if you have to shrink the font size of the temperature a little to allow the degree symbol to fit.

title: Love it
comment: Large numbers look great against my dark background. Now I wish I could do the same for my clock and other notifications.

title: Properly sized, but doesn't show the negative sign.
comment: The temperature icon turns blue when the temperature is negative, but doesn't show any negative sign.  Needs an option for color and an option for the displaying of units.  Also, why not just roll all of these skins into the main Weather Notification app?

title: Super
comment: Super if u can add a celsius symbol will be awesome, i like the size of this skin its alot more clear and visible but its bad that is only in a gold colour and regarding to this all will want diferent colours to match with the other stuffs in the screen and the status bar so if u can add in the new version we to be able to choice a colour of the notiffication will be perfect when u ha e choices to change it when u want.

title: Great but......THANK YOU!
comment: Changed review... I made request for text color option for the notification text... Well done! I absolutely love this! Thanks :-)
